tags.x-notes:
For accountLink().appLaunch(), use Discovery.entitlements().
For accountLink().signIn(), use Discovery.signIn().
For accountLink().signOut(), use Discovery.signOut().
For accountLink().updateEntitlements(), use Discovery.entitlements()

tags.name: developerNotes
tags.x-notes:
For info().zipcode, use Localization.postalCode()
For info().timezone, timeZone, or receiverId, these calls have been deprecated
For info().deviceHash, use Device.uid()
For info().householdId, use Device.household()
For info().privacySettings, use Advertising.config().privacyData
For info().userExperience, use Profile().flags
For info().receiverVersion, use Device.version().firmware[firebolt version > 0.9.0]

tags.name: developerNotes
tags.x-notes:
For deviceCapabilities().deviceType, use Device.type()
For deviceCapabilities.nativeDimensions, use Device.screenResolution()
For deviceCapabilities.webBrowser.browserType, use Device.platform()
For deviceCapabilities().settopHdrSupport & tvHdrSupport, use Device.hdr()
For deviceCapabilities().settopHDCPVersion & tvHDCPVersion, use Device.hdcp()
For deviceCapabilities().videoDimensions, use Device.videoResolution()

 For showPurchasePinOverlay() use Profile.approvePurchase()

For userPreferences().promptSignInEmail(), use Keyboard.email('signIn').
For userPreferences().promptSignUpEmail(), use Keyboard.email('signUp').

tags.name: developerNotes
tags.x-notes:
There is no firebolt equivalent for this $badger method.
For DisplayPersonalizedRecommendations, use Discovery.policy().
For RememberWatchedPrograms, use Discovery.policy().
For friendly_name, use Device.name().
For power_save_status, no firebolt equivalent.
For ShareWatchHistoryStatus, user Discovery.policy()

tags.name: developerNotes
tags.x-notes:
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['ShowClosedCapture']), use Accessibility.onClosedCaptionsSettingsChanged()
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['TextToSpeechEnabled2']), use Accessibility.onVoiceGuidanceSettingsChanged()
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['DisplayPersonalizedRecommendations']), use Discovery.onPolicyChanged()
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['RememberWatchedPrograms']), use Discovery.onPolicyChanged()
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['friendly_name']), use Device.onNameChanged()
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['power_save_status']), no firebolt equivalent
For userPreferences().subscribeToSettings(['ShareWatchHistoryStatus']), user Discovery.onPolicyChanged()
